post.description: Initiates a challenge deposit to verify user identity by sending a small amount to the bank account.
Get insights about a phone number such as whether it is active or disconnected, whether its associated device is reachable or unreachable, and its associated device's roaming status.

The Phone ID service provides identity checks and enriched data linked to a phone number. It includes optional modules like age verification, breached data, call forwarding detection, contact info, contact match, number deactivation, subscriber status, porting history, porting status, and SIM swap.

referenceId.description: Unique identifier for the transaction generated by your system.

returnUrl.description: URL to redirect after payment completion â€“ back to the calling app or website.

amount.description: Payment amount formatted as a decimal string.

requestId.description: Unique identifier for the request. Will be used to query the transfer status in the Retrieve Transaction Status API call.

redirectUrl.description: URL to redirect the user to the hosted payment page.

referenceId.description: Unique identifier for the transaction generated from the Initiate Payment API call.

x-enumDescriptions.PROCESSING: The transaction is in process; the final status has not yet been received from the bank.
x-enumDescriptions.SUCCESS: Successful payment initiation has been received from the bank. Settlement might not be complete.
x-enumDescriptions.INITIATED: The transaction was initiated but the result is unknown. This status will not be updated further.
x-enumDescriptions.PENDING: Authorization at the bank is complete; transfer is pending redemption (2-step flows).
x-enumDescriptions.PENDING_EXTERNAL_AUTHORIZATION: User is at the bank to complete authorization; may transition to FAILURE_EXPIRED.
x-enumDescriptions.FAILURE_GENERIC: Technical failure with no additional details from the bank.
x-enumDescriptions.FAILURE_PERMISSION_DENIED: User denied authorization at the bank (2-step flows).
x-enumDescriptions.FAILURE_CANCELED: Payment initiation was canceled before execution.
x-enumDescriptions.FAILURE_EXPIRED: Authorization not completed in time; payment expired.
x-enumDescriptions.SETTLEMENT_IN_PROGRESS: Waiting for funds to reach the payee bank.
x-enumDescriptions.SETTLEMENT_COMPLETED: Funds reached the payee bank; reconciliation complete.
x-enumDescriptions.SETTLEMENT_INCOMPLETE: Reconciliation failed; corresponding transaction not found.

description.description: Mandatory, non-blank. Alphanumeric only; hyphens (-) allowed as separators. No spaces or other special characters.

piiToggle.description: Determines if PII details should be returned.

transactionId.description: Unique identifier for the challenge deposit transaction.

returnedLastName.description: Last name returned from verification if available and `piiToggle = 1`.
